page.title: 16MY DAY
page.content: I live at the Offenham Bridge. I wake up at 7.30, get dressed,washed and go downstairs to help my dad take all of the bottles out of the bottle trolley and put them into the crates. Then I put the full bottles on the shelves ready for selling. By that time most of the boats are on their way back to the boatyard because they have to be back at 9.00am. Then Igo upstairs and watch television until 10.30am when I go and play with my mates. We start getting busy at about 12.30 and we have about two boats in if it is nice weather. We usually close at 2.30 or 3.00. By then most of the customers have gone and I go outside to collect the glasses. We have our tea at about 4.30 and I go upstairs for a sleep.
